thread.title: Renee

author: Renee
title: Renee
text: The process is smooth and easy for bringing in your car and receiving a check. The only reason I give it four instead of five stars is the fees. You automatically have $300 in title fees. Then any issues with the paint or any scratches that could be easily buffed out $80 to $150 is taken out of your appraisal amount for each area on the car. So basically if you were offered 3500 you're down to 3000. The check they issue you Will incur fees at their bank if you cash it. Wells Fargo. It's the way this company has set up their agreement with the bank, not the bank. Obviously, you wouldn't have fees if you use your own bank. Lots of sneaky fees.
